identity.name: Abdul Rehman
identity.positioning: Product-focused senior engineer who builds scalable SaaS, AI-powered systems, and modernizes complex legacy platforms end-to-end.

strength_areas: Legacy system migrations (especially .NET MVC to Next.js)
Performance optimization (Core Web Vitals, LCP, caching)
Complex database design (recursive CTEs, partitioning, indexing)

Integrated Google, Facebook, TikTok analytics and tracking
Migrated CMS data from Exigo to Strapi
Designed and implemented complex recursive commissioning system

career_highlights.summary: Built and optimized a desktop replay and video streaming system with cloud sync and Jira integrations.
achievements: Implemented cloud sync and storage cleanup
Developed Jira plugin for replay previews
Streamed video from local machine to server
Debugged CPU usage and performance bottlenecks

career_highlights.summary: Built a COD-based e-commerce store for surgical instruments.
Wrote feature tests and mocked third-party services.
